snippet.title: The Pit: Infinity - Coop Multiplayer Trailer
snippet.description:
On Friday, March 15th, 2019, The Pit: Infinity enters phase 2 of Early Access on Steam, with the update to include multiplayer coop. Now you and two friends can join forces in your assault upon The Pit!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/577410/The_Pit_Infinity/

Music: I Want To Live by The Darkest of the Hillside Thickets
https://thedarkestofthehillsidethickets.bandcamp.com/
